title: Instructional Design (ID) Competency Assessment and Portfolio-Based Reflective Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Instructional Design Knowledge and Curriculum Development Experience
context.additional_context: Project-based assessment using digital devices for intermediate learners with science vocational training development capabilities.

learning_goals: Learners can self-assess instructional design competencies according to AECT and IBSTPI standards and reflect through portfolios
Learners can develop an action plan to improve the weakest competencies—'Utilization' and 'Implementation and Management'—in science curriculum design
Learners can analyze core achievement cases by instructional design standards and apply them to future educational program development
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
